AccountName.description: The name of the account associated with the campaign.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the campaign.

AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the campaign.

TimePeriod.description: The specific date and time period the data corresponds to.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the campaign.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network of the ad.

Impressions.description: The total number of impressions for the ad.

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad.

Ctr.description: The click-through rate for the campaign.

AverageCpc.description: The average cost per click of the ad.

Spend.description: The total amount spent on the campaign.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad in search results.

Conversions.description: The total number of conversions for the campaign.

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for the campaign.

CostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for the campaign.

LowQualityClicks.description: The total number of low-quality clicks.

LowQualityImpressions.description: The total number of low-quality impressions.

LowQualityConversions.description: The total number of conversions from low-quality clicks.

LowQualityConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for low-quality clicks.

DeviceType.description: The type of device where the ad was displayed.

QualityScore.description: The quality score assigned to the ad.

ExpectedCtr.description: The expected click-through rate for the ad.

AdRelevance.description: The relevance score of the ad.

PhoneImpressions.description: The total number of impressions on phones.

PhoneCalls.description: The total number of phone calls generated.

Ptr.description: The phone-through rate for the ad.

Network.description: The network where the ad was displayed.

Assists.description: The number of assists in the conversion process.

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the campaign.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for the campaign.

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist in the conversion process.

RevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion for the campaign.

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue per assist in the conversion process.

TrackingTemplate.description: The tracking template used for the ad.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the account associated with the campaign.

LowQualityGeneralClicks.description: The total number of general clicks from low-quality sources.

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: The total number of sophisticated clicks from low-quality sources.

FinalUrlSuffix.description: The final URL suffix for the ad.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions for the campaign.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions for the campaign.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue for all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The overall conversion rate for all conversions.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion for all conversions.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions for the campaign.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions of the ad.

ConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions for the campaign.

LowQualityConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions from low-quality clicks.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified conversions for all conversions.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified view-through conversions for the campaign.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from view-through conversions for the campaign.

VideoViews.description: The total number of video views.

ViewThroughRate.description: The view-through rate for the campaign.

AverageCPV.description: The average cost per view of the ad.

VideoViewsAt25Percent.description: The total number of video views at 25% completion.

VideoViewsAt50Percent.description: The total number of video views at 50% completion.

VideoViewsAt75Percent.description: The total number of video views at 75% completion.

CompletedVideoViews.description: The total number of completed video views.

VideoCompletionRate.description: The completion rate for video ads.

TotalWatchTimeInMS.description: The total watch time in milliseconds for video ads.

AverageWatchTimePerVideoView.description: The average watch time per video view.

AverageWatchTimePerImpression.description: The average watch time per impression for video ads.

Sales.description: The total number of sales generated.

CostPerSale.description: The cost per sale for the campaign.

RevenuePerSale.description: The revenue per sale for the campaign.

Installs.description: The total number of app installs generated.

CostPerInstall.description: The cost per install for the campaign.

RevenuePerInstall.description: The revenue per install for the campaign.
